topics.body: I heard a interesting theory as to why so many games have a hard time balancing: psychology.  To put it another way why racing stripes make cars go faster. . . that's not a joke either; even though cars and even though most games try to be as balanced as possible the person's mind determines whether or not they lose.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
